title: Automated Grading & Code Evaluation Platform
description: Automated grading platform that downloads student GitHub repos, runs configuration-driven grading logic, and shows real-time results/analytics across cohorts.

title: Talents Media — Social & Job Automation Platform
description: Full-stack platform combining social media features with job application automation workflows (auth, real-time interactions, feed logic, job matching foundations).

title: UI Hub — Internal Multi-Project Dashboard
description: Internal UI hub aggregating multiple projects into a single dashboard; built under tight delivery timelines.

title: Nuclear Physics Learning Platform
description: Interactive learning web app for nuclear physics concepts & equations with animations and KaTeX rendering.

title: Zain JO Landing Page
description: Responsive landing page built with modern UI and clean layout.
